title: #1520 Write That Down!
itunes:title: #1520 Write That Down!
description:
Today's show opens with a continued conversation about group memory. Adam then reflects on a Jimmy Carter documentary he was watching, and the way the media has started to lift up Carter's image after comparisons began getting made to President Biden. From there the guys take calls about withdrawal, adultery, and water cremation. As the show wraps up, Adam and Drew speak with one last caller about the successful insurrection in Egypt back in 2011.
